welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lincolnton, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful natural landscapes. We hope you enjoy your time here and invite you to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hickory Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Hickory Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Statesville Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Statesville Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal houses all domestic and international flights, as well as check-in counters, security checkpoints, and baggage claim.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and chartered flights, with its own separate entrance and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
